title: QIAgen DNeasy Blood & Tissue kit, cultured cells
original description: QIAgen's DNeasy Blood & Tissue kit (cat#69504 or 69506) for cultured cells
steps:
None
1. Centrifuge a maximum of 5 million cells for 5 minutes at 300g 
300s
2. Resuspend pellet in 200μL of PBS 
200amount 
reagents
3. Add 20μL proteinase K. 
20amount 
reagents
4. Add 200μL Buffer AL and mix thoroughly by vortexing 
200amount 
reagents
5. Add 200μL pure ethanol and mix by vortexing 
200amount 
reagents
6. Pipet mixture into DNeasy Mini spin column placed on a 2mL collection tube (supplied with kit)
7. Centrifuge column at ≥6,000g for 1 minute 
60s
8. Discard collection tube and flow through
9. Place spin column in new 2mL collection tube
10. Add 500μL buffer AW1 
500amount 
reagents
11. Centrifuge for 1 minute at≥6,000g 
60s
12. Discard collection tube and flow through
13. Add 500μL of Buffer AW2 
500amount 
reagents
14. Centrifuge at 20,000g for 3 minutes 
1800s
15. Discard collection tube and flow through
16. Transfer spin column to new (final and labeled) collection tube [optionally sterilized]
17. Elute DNA by adding 200μL of buffer AE to the center of the spin column 
200amount 
reagents
18. Incubate for 1 minute at room temperature 
60s
19. Centrifuge at ≥6,000g for 1 minute 
60s
20. [Optiona]: Repeat step 19 for increased DNA yield
ai_generated_description: This protocol describes the use of the QIAgen DNeasy Blood & Tissue kit to extract DNA from cultured cells. The process involves the use of reagents provided in the kit, centrifugation, and multiple buffer washes, resulting in purified and concentrated DNA for further use.

# Protocol steps
centrifuge_cells(cell_count="5 million cells", centrifuge_speed="300g", centrifuge_time="5 minutes")
resuspend_pellet_in_buffer(pellet="cell pellet", volume="200µL", buffer="PBS")
add_reagent(volume="20µL", reagent="proteinase K")
add_reagent(volume="200µL", reagent="Buffer AL")
mix_by_vortexing(mixture="cell lysate")
add_reagent(volume="200µL", reagent="pure ethanol")
mix_by_vortexing(mixture="ethanol-cell lysate mixture")
pipet_mixture_to_column(mixture="ethanol-cell lysate mixture", column_type="DNeasy Mini spin column", collection_tube_vol="2mL")
centrifuge_column(column="DNeasy Mini spin column", centrifuge_speed="6,000g", centrifuge_time="1 minute")
discard_tube_and_flow_through(collection_tube="2mL collection tube")
place_column_in_new_tube(column="DNeasy Mini spin column", new_tube_vol="2mL")
add_reagent(volume="500µL", reagent="Buffer AW1")
centrifuge_column(column="DNeasy Mini spin column", centrifuge_speed="6,000g", centrifuge_time="1 minute")
discard_tube_and_flow_through(collection_tube="2mL collection tube")
place_column_in_new_tube(column="DNeasy Mini spin column", new_tube_vol="2mL")
add_reagent(volume="500µL", reagent="Buffer AW2")
centrifuge_column(column="DNeasy Mini spin column", centrifuge_speed="20,000g", centrifuge_time="3 minutes")
discard_tube_and_flow_through(collection_tube="2mL collection tube")
place_column_in_new_tube(column="DNeasy Mini spin column", new_tube_vol="2mL", final_labelled=True)
elute_DNA(column="DNeasy Mini spin column", volume="200µL", buffer="Buffer AE")
incubate(tube="2mL collection tube", incubation_time="1 minute", temperature="room temperature")
centrifuge_column(column="DNeasy Mini spin column", centrifuge_speed="6,000g", centrifuge_time="1 minute")
# optionally repeat the previous step for increased DNA yield
# end of protocol
